short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple extension that will help you with store your old and new plugins, themes version before Wordpress update.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple extension that will help you with store your old and new plugins, themes version before Wordpress update. If you want to use it go in Wordpress panel into "Dashboard" -> Updates. Next click plug icon in plugin bar and click "Generate WP update backlog". That is all. Your backlog has been generated in dev console.
